text: The men's 400 metres event at the 1978 Commonwealth Games was held on 6 and 7 August at the Commonwealth Stadium in Edmonton, Alberta, Canada. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:left" |- align="center" | width=200 bgcolor=gold|Gold||width=200 bgcolor=silver|Silver|| width=200 bgcolor=CC9966|Bronze |- |Rick Mitchell '''' |Joseph Coombs '''' |Glenn Bogue '''' |} ==Results== ===Heats=== Held on 6 August Qualification: First 5 in each heat (Q) and the next 2 fastest (q) qualify for the quarterfinals. {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !!
